question: On Thursday, Isabella wants to exercise for thrice the amount of time he did on Wednesday and Tuesday combined. On Tuesday he exercised for 43 minutes. On Wednesday he exercised for 59 minutes. How many minutes does he have to exercise on Thursday to reach his goal?
answer:
On Tuesday and Wednesday he exercised a total of 102 minutes because 43 + 59 = <<43+59=102>>102
On Thursday he has to exercise for 306 minutes because 102*3 = <<102*3=306>>306
#### 306
